ResearchProjectDef.label: insulated batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build insulated batteries, for those times you absolutely must place a battery outside or in the heat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: insulated cables
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to smith insulated cables, which can be buried under the ground or used in more advanced recipes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: diodes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build diodes, anodes, and cathodes for constructing one-way power distribution.

ResearchProjectDef.label: enhanced batteries
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build enhanced batteries, which are more efficient and store more energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: enhanced solar panels
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build enhanced solar panels to harness more power from sunlight.
